forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning fog, then mostly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 49F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
